alert.note: Alert for Audrain; Monroe; Montgomery; Pike; Ralls (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 7:51AM CDT until August 26 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Ralls County in northeastern Missouri... Northeastern Audrain County in central Missouri... Northeastern Montgomery County in east central Missouri... Southeastern Monroe County in northeastern Missouri... Southwestern Pike County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 830 AM CDT. * At 750 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Laddonia, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bowling Green, Vandalia, Santa Fe, Perry, Laddonia, Farber, Curryville, Tarrants, New Hartford, Middletown, Rush Hill, St. Clement, and Ashley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
